questions.question: Sachin Tendulkar has scored more international runs than any other batsman.
Muttiah Muralitharan has taken more international wickets than any other bowler.
MS Dhoni has the most dismissals by a wicket-keeper in international cricket.
Jacques Kallis has scored more than 10,000 runs and taken more than 250 wickets in Tests.
Virat Kohli has the highest average among batsmen with 5000+ ODI runs.
Shane Warne has taken more Test wickets than any other leg-spinner.
Ricky Ponting has scored more World Cup runs than any other batsman.
Anil Kumble is the leading wicket-taker for India in Test cricket.
AB de Villiers has the fastest ODI century in terms of balls faced.
Shahid Afridi has hit more sixes in international cricket than Chris Gayle.
